title: Organisational Structure Chart for Social Care (Adults & Children) & Public Health

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide the organisational structure charts (including names, job title, email address & contact numbers for Social Care (Adult & Children) & Public Health directorate covering the following job titles:
Social Care - Director, Assistant Director, Head of Service, Service Manager.
Public Health - Director, Assistant/Associate Director, Consultant, Managers
I look forward to your response.
Yours faithfully,
James Withington

Dear James Withington,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Organisational
Structure Chart for Social Care (Adults & Children) & Public Health which
we received on 17/07/2023.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 14/08/2023. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [1][Sheffield City Council request email]
From: James Withington <[FOI #1004376 email]>
Sent: Monday, July 17, 2023 7:32 AM
To: FOI <[Sheffield City Council request email]>
Subject: Freedom of Information request - Organisational Structure Chart
for Social Care (Adults & Children) & Public Health
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide the organisational structure charts (including names, job
title, email address & contact numbers for Social Care (Adult & Children)
& Public Health directorate covering the following job titles:
Social Care - Director, Assistant Director, Head of Service, Service
Manager.
Public Health - Director, Assistant/Associate Director, Consultant,
Managers
I look forward to your response.
Yours faithfully,
James Withington

Dear James Withington,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Organisational
Structure Chart for Social Care (Adults & Children) & Public Health which
we received on 17/07/2023.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
Please see the attached documents.
Please note that the names of individuals have been withheld under section
40(2) of the Freedom of Information Act 2000 on the grounds that these are
personal data and disclosure would contravene the data protection
principle under Article 5(1)(a) of the UK General Data Protection
Regulation that processing of personal data must be lawful, fair, and
transparent.
Contact details for the services you are interested in are available at
the following link:  [1]Sheffield City Council management teams |
Sheffield City Council
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [2]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see
[3]
https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
